allData.occupation: Marketing & Sales Leader | Data-Driven & Customer-Centric Growth, Scalable Go-to-market Execution | I Help B2B & Consulting Firms Align Sales & Marketing for 24% Funnel Conversion & Data-Driven Revenue Growth

positions.title: Director Marketing, Sales & Loyalty
positions.description:
appliedAI is a joint Venture out of UnternehmerTum GmbH (Europe's leading center for start-ups and innovation) and IPAI Management GmbH (The Global Home of Human AI)
In my current role, I oversee the strategic alignment of marketing, sales, and commercial excellence initiatives to strengthen appliedAI‚Äôs position as Europe‚Äôs leading AI initiative. My focus is on driving measurable revenue growth, optimizing Go-To-Market (GTM) execution, and fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration.

Key Responsibilities & Achievements:
üìç Commercial Excellence & Revenue Growth: Developed and executed data-driven sales and pricing strategies, increasing sales funnel conversion rates to the top benchmark range for tech consulting.

üìç Go-To-Market (GTM) Execution: Implemented a structured GTM framework, enhancing market penetration and customer engagement across key industry segments.

üìç Branding & Rebranding: Led the end-to-end rebranding process, redefining the organization‚Äôs market positioning, messaging, and strategic differentiation in the AI space.

üìç Sales Enablement & Customer Loyalty: Established a data-driven sales enablement framework, improving customer retention and long-term value through targeted engagement programs.

üìç Team Leadership & Agile Excellence: Built and scaled a multidisciplinary, high-performing team, leveraging Agile methodologies (Scrum, OKRs) to drive efficiency and alignment.

üìç Market & Competitive Insights: Led market research and trend analysis, ensuring appliedAI‚Äôs competitive positioning and thought leadership in AI-driven innovation.

üéØ Key Focus: Empowering businesses to harness AI-driven innovation while delivering measurable growth and industry leadership.

positions.title: Head of Business Development, Sales and Marketing
positions.description:
In this role, I was responsible for driving business development and market expansion, building partnerships, and enhancing appliedAI‚Äôs market visibility and reputation.

Key Responsibilities & Achievements:
üìç Business Development: Forged strategic partnerships across industries, fostering cross-sector collaboration in AI.
üìç Sales Leadership: Designed and implemented sales strategies, optimizing client acquisition and boosting revenue.
üìç Marketing Excellence: Developed impactful campaigns that elevated the organization‚Äôs visibility and strengthened its industry reputation.
üìç Innovation & Collaboration: Led initiatives to align cross-functional teams and drive digital transformation.
üìç Team Leadership: Built and mentored a high-performing team, delivering on organizational objectives and scaling operations.

üéØ Key Focus: Creating new market opportunities and driving growth to enable European industries to thrive in the AI age.

positions.title: Chief Sales and Marketing Officer
positions.description:
As part of a dynamic AI startup, I led all revenue-generating activities‚Äîincluding operations, sales, marketing, pricing, and revenue management‚Äîwhile reporting directly to the founders & CEO. My mission was to drive scalable growth, create strategic frameworks, and position the company as a leader in AI services and products.

Key Achievements:
üìç Business Model Development: Designed and implemented marketing and sales operating models, effectively targeting 15 industries and unlocking new revenue opportunities.
üìç Digital Marketing Strategy: Built an integrated inbound and outbound marketing ecosystem, driving qualified lead generation and increasing customer acquisition.
üìç Sales Process Optimization: Established KPIs and performance metrics for marketing and sales, leading to measurable efficiency gains and better alignment with business objectives. Sales Funnel Conversion was in the Top Benchmark for Tech Consulting.
üìç Executive-Level Engagement: Delivered tailored AI solutions (Computer Vision, NLP, Machine Learning) to C-level executives, fostering trust and driving long-term partnerships.
üìç Customer-Centric Innovation: Identified and addressed specific customer needs, aligning AI offerings with market demands and building the foundation for sustainable growth.

positions.title: Chief Operating Officer (ppa.)
positions.description:
As COO, I was responsible for building and scaling a new business unit for custom software development (AR/VR, CMS, Web) and IT operations services. Reporting directly to the CEO, I managed P&L, strategic planning, and operational excellence.

Key Achievements:

üìçTeam Leadership: Built and led a team of 15+ employees, fostering a culture of collaboration and high performance.
üìçP&L responsibility
üìçProcess Optimization: Designed and implemented DIN ISO 9001 and 27001-compliant processes and agile methodologies, increasing project productivity by 30%.
üìçSales Growth: Implemented a sales funnel management system, leading to new customers like the City of Paderborn and the German Ministry of the Interior.
üìçMarketing Innovation: Established the digital marketing framework, including website, SEO, and ad campaigns, driving inbound and outbound lead generation.
üìçProduct Development: Initiated and executed the development of "Pollytools" SaaS, positioning the company for long-term growth.

positions.title: Chief Sales and Marketing Officer + Head of Software Development (AR & VR applications)
positions.description:
Led sales, marketing, and technical teams for custom AR/VR software solutions. Focused on driving business growth and operational efficiency.

Key Contributions:

üìçConsultative selling of AR/VR solutions across various industries.
üìçOversaw technical teams, ensuring seamless integration of client requirements with creative outputs.
üìçExpanded market presence through strategic marketing initiatives and partnership building.

educations.schoolName: Steinbeis School of Management & Innovation Berlin, Bocconi Milan, NYU Stern

educations.fieldOfStudy: Economic Sciences (Focus areas: Marketing, International Management, Economic Psychology)

allData.headline: Marketing & Sales Leader | Data-Driven & Customer-Centric Growth, Scalable Go-to-market Execution | I Help B2B & Consulting Firms Align Sales & Marketing for 24% Funnel Conversion & Data-Driven Revenue Growth
allData.summary:
Welcome üëã ‚Äì Let‚Äôs Talk Growth, AI & Go-to-Market (GTM) Execution
I help B2B & Consulting Firms build AI-driven Sales & Marketing strategies that scale.
With 20+ years in B2B/B2C, I‚Äôve led GTM strategies, built scalable revenue structures, and optimized Commercial Excellence frameworks to align sales, marketing & AI for measurable growth.

My expertise:
üîπ Structuring scalable GTM & Sales Frameworks from ICP & Buyer Journeys to AI-powered Revenue Operations.
üîπ Building high-performance teams & integrating CRM, AI & analytics for predictable growth.
üîπ Optimizing Sales Funnels & Conversion Rates for maximum revenue impact.
üîπ Advising C-Level executives on aligning AI & data with business growth strategies.

Proven Results:
‚úî Achieved 24% Funnel Conversion through AI-enhanced sales enablement & data-driven decision-making.
‚úî Implemented Commercial Excellence frameworks across Automotive, IT & Tech Consulting.

Let‚Äôs connect! If you‚Äôre passionate about AI, Sales & Marketing innovation, I‚Äôd love to exchange insights.
